name: Noen
description:
You can only move by dashing and its cooldown is shared with your stronger weapons. Try to survive as long as you can while avoiding the enemies and their bullets!

Controls:

  • Shoot - Left Mouse Button
  • Dash - Space / Right Mouse Button
  • Handgun - 1
  • Fear Gun - 2
  • Freeze Gun - 3
  • Explosion Gun - 4
  • Pause - Escape / Enter

Art Design by João Marcelo (@nankinsamurai on instagram)

Graphic Design by Lucas Cipriano dos Santos

Programming by Alice Figueiredo
